The problem with external hard drives is that they're meant as a backup and not to use for everyday use.  It's like using your spare tire to drive around; if your spare tire goes flat as well you're fucked.

topics.body:
I can never draw manga/anime style characters.

I'm terrible at drawing stuff like Dragon Ball, One Piece, Bleach, Attack On Titan, Coppelion, etc.

The only things I can draw are cartoon characters and quirky, simple comic strips.

topics.body:
I can kinda draw, and if you're interested you can easily find my stuff on DA and furaffinity. Same user name, but I haven't in a long time because while I am at best technically competent, and I like to think my sketchy, heavily inked style is at least distinct in a sort of punk rock sort of way (read: bad), but I eventually reached the conclusion that my artistic talents sort of plateaued around 2010.

I was decent enough at gore and monsters, and that's mostly what I did. Truth be told I'm a bit embarrassed by a lot of that stuff now. I did a lot of guro artwork on FA.

topics.body:

But I'm not going to stop just because of that!

So, do you guys want to hear the short summary or long one? (Note: it's very manga-like)
